title: David Autor named NOMIS 2023 Distinguished Scientist
summary: David H. Autor, an economist at MIT, has been recognized as one of the 2023 NOMIS Distinguished Scientists for his research on the effects of technological change and globalization on jobs and earnings. The award is given to researchers who have made significant contributions to their fields. Autor will also lead the NOMIS Foundation's Expertise project, which aims to understand the impact of new technologies on expertise. His colleagues and peers praise his research and contributions to labor economics. The award will be presented in October in Zurich, Switzerland.
